document_data.name: Olin Mirynne
document_data.mainbody: '''Olin Mirynne''' was an [[elf]] [[fighter]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.Description: Olin had blue eyes and light skin. He wore a full suit of silvery [[chainmail]] with leafy-styled plates, and carried a fine [[shield]] and [[axe]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}} during the [[Elven Crusade]], Olin joined the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] at their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|large camp]] on the outskirts of [[Myth Drannor]]. He served as a trainer for fighters there.
